definitions.definition: A specialist in the study of Greek language , literature, culture, or history, or an admirer of the Greek culture and civilization.
A person who adopted the Greek customs , language and culture during the Hellenistic period, especially a Hellenized Jew.
A non-Greek follower and practitioner of Hellenic religion (aka Hellenism )

main_definition: A specialist in the study of Greek language , literature, culture, or history, or an admirer of the Greek culture and civilization.
secondary_definitions: A person who adopted the Greek customs , language and culture during the Hellenistic period, especially a Hellenized Jew.
A non-Greek follower and practitioner of Hellenic religion (aka Hellenism )
